SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network

Interface NetworkManagerClient

All Superinterfaces:
ConcreteContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientNetworkRMIManager, ClientNetworkTCPManager
public interface NetworkManagerClient extends ConcreteContext
The NetworkManagerInterface defines methods that each class which communicates through the network with a specific protocol must implement
